title: Research Assistant in Health Data Visualization
content:
Front end web development for health data visualization and interaction using React.

Reimplement the IQuery website, a web-based health data query system from Illinois Department of Public Health, making it faster and more user-friendly. The new website will have a modern and straightforward interface with better data visualizations that allow both ordinary users and health professionals to gain a better experience and achieve their goals.

title: Research Assistant at UIUC Social Spaces Group
content:
Working with Kristen Vaccaro on her project further exploring the cause of the placebo effect created by control settings.

Developed a web tool that connects to social media API and allows users filter their news feed.

Also worked on exploratory data mining and analytics on large datasets.

title: Internship at Cybernet Systems
content: Maintain their Chinese website and work on software demos.
